title: Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 42 of 2019)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) 

(Amendment) Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited landlord tenant (ground rents) (amendment) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 42 of 2019)
heading: 2. The 17th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 42 of 2019) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 January, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [11] 3
text_norm: 2 17th day january 2020 appointed day landlord tenant (ground rents) (amendment) act 2019 (no 42 2019) shall come operation given official seal 16 january 2020 charles flanagan minister justice equality notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 21st january 2020 11 3

title: Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 42 of 2019)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Act amends the Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (No.2) Act 1978 
and the Valuation Act 2001 in order to clarify the rights of ground rent tenants 
to acquire acquiring the freehold title of their properties. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [11]
